verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We leave all things behind To answer Your wondrous call. Your voice rings out, “Come follow Me, Come follow the Lord of all! “{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To hear what You demand Brings joy, not tears nor pain. What does it matter what we lose When it is Christ we gain?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Then what shall we possess? What riches shall we hold? To know You, Lord, is wealth enough To last for years untold.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We’ll know You as You are, Not as our minds conceive. The only limit left for us Is what we dare believe.{/lang-eng}
